description: The vision of DCFS is to make it easier to develop, operate, and interoperate data commons, data clouds, knowledge bases, and other resources for managing, analyzing, and sharing research data that can be part of a large data commons ecosystem.
name: NCI Data Commons Framework Services

resources.description: The vision of DCFS is to make it easier to develop, operate, and interoperate data commons, data clouds, knowledge bases, and other resources for managing, analyzing, and sharing research data that can be part of a large data commons ecosystem.

institution.description: The Open Commons Consortium (OCC) manages and operates cloud computing, data commons, and data ecosystems to advance scientific, medical, health care and environmental research for human and societal impact.
institution.name: Open Commons Consortium

resources.name: NCI Data Commons Framework Services
